subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Jozy Altidore remains an important player for the U.S. national team, but his sporadic appearances for his English club, Hull City, could affect his preparations for next year’s World Cup.
snippet: Jozy Altidore remains an important player for the U.S. national team, but his sporadic appearances for his English club, Hull City, could affect his preparations for next year’s World Cup.
